welcome.title: Welcome to our RS-Trello
welcome.info: RS-Trello is a visual tool that allows your team to manage projects, workflows, and tasks of all types. Add files, task lists - and customize it all so that it is convenient for the team to work.
welcome.ulutka: Setup workflow, Sign In/Sign Up form, localisation, popup for errors, and some small features.
welcome.anterebol: Routing, board page structure, drag and drop, home page, page 404 and a lot of small tweaks.
welcome.mikel2003: Suspense feature, error boundary, lazy loading component, welcome page, header and footer.
